description: Primes formed from concatenation of two consecutive Fibonacci numbers.
comments: The next term -- a(7) -- has 100 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 04 2013
mathematica: Select[FromDigits[Flatten[Join[IntegerDigits/@#]]]&/@ Partition[ Fibonacci[ Range[400]],2,1],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 04 2013 *)
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: Offset corrected by Arkadiusz Wesolowski, May 10 2012
